Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation following SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is immediately preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that occur after a major or minor revision cycle (e.g., after RW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in comparison to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears before Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Number of cases where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation events that belong to cases ultimately leading to acceptance (i.e., ending with Manuscript Export Succeeded after First Look steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to the total number of “First Look”-related activities (e.g., First Look-Please submit updates, First Look-Your updates are due in one week, etc.)
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that also contain at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Agreed earlier in the trace
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of variants in which First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs as part of a resubmission workflow initiated after SW-EIC Major Revision or SW-EIC Minor Revision
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that occur within 7 days of a preceding First Look-Your updates are overdue notification
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation compared to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of all manuscript submission confirmations (Original, Revised, Resubmission, First Look) that are of type First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
